General.Name: Shanghai Smart Control Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Smart Control Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automatic control products in China. It offers display products, controllers, display controllers, IO modules, keypads, sensors, and cameras. The company's products are used in construction machinery, fire fighting vehicles, agricultural machinery, mining equipment, sanitation vehicles, special vehicles, petroleum equipment, new energy, vessels and port machinery, rail transition, industrial control, and other related fields. Shanghai Smart Control Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Hongying  Zeng
1.Title: Director, Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
